entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
